Welcome to Particles in box demo’s documentation!¶

This is an example project to show how to set up scientific computing python projects.

In the demo we went through:

  • Basics of git

  • Unit testing with pytest

  • Pre-commit hooks

  • Setting up simple continuous development pipeline using GitHub actions

  • Sphinx

  • Publishing documentation in readthedocs.io

Contents:

  • Instructions to run the particle in box demo
  • Documentation
    • particle.py
    • simulation.py
